title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is 'MySomeClass'.
OB: When running the code, the output is 'MySomeAnn'. However, I expected the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This behavior is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 specification. It's worth noting that my code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
